text: Jabkay unn kay aemaal ko shetan zeenat daar dikha raha tha aur keh raha tha kay logon mein say koi bhi aaj tum per ghalib nahi aa sakta mein khud bhi tumhara himayati hun lekin jab donon jamaten namoo daar huen to apni aeriyon kay ball peechay hatt gaya aur kehnay laga mein tum say bari hun. Mein woh dekh raha hun jo tum nahi dekh rahey. Mein Allah say darta hun aur Allah Taalaa sakhta azab wala hai
